Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: fredy
Reviews.Content: a great article, me to run very well, it is a product that meets the needs for which it was acquired, and does not disappoint me, complying with each and every one of my needs.

Reviews.Title: Poor packaging
Reviews.Author: Tzimm
Reviews.Content: Unpacking is nightmare! Buy a cord that is wound up in a circle. Instant tangle right out of the package

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one audio, video and power cable
4 Pack 100 feet video/audio/power cables in black
Plug and Play ready. For camera with DC power only
RCA for audio and BNC for video. Comes with 8 RCA Male to BNC Female connectors
2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack 100ft Feet Video Audio Power Cables Security Camera DVR Wire BNC RCA Cord with Bonus Connectors for Home CCTV Surveillance System 1LT
